title: Spiritual Essential Oil Blend
cleaned_text: Creates a feeling of being wrapped in a cocoon of spiritual quietness. Wonderful to put on before meditation or prayer. Aromatherapy can add to a meaningful worship experience. This blend combines oils traditionally used by the Native Americans as well. Ingredients: Cedarwood, Balsam Fir, Sandalwoods (Aloes), Organic Frankincense, Rosewood, Myrtle and Myrrh Essential Oils Compares to the Young Living® Company's essential oil blend Inspiration®.
